price: ای مردم، [همۀ] شما به الله نیازمندید و [تنها] الله است که بی‌نیازِ ستوده است.
arabic: ۞ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ أَنتُمُ ٱلۡفُقَرَآءُ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۖ وَٱللَّهُ هُوَ ٱلۡغَنِيُّ ٱلۡحَمِيدُ

version.title: Persian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Persian by the team of the Persian language in Rowwad Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nāsu antumu al-fuqarāu ilā al-lahi wal-lahu huwa al-ghaniyu al-ḥamīdu
